project1.title: SWGOH Counters List
project1.subtitle: Front-End Capstone
project1.description: An iOS game companion built with React, utilizing Firebase for database CRUD implementation.

project2.title: Cashew Outside
project2.subtitle: Firebase CRUD Group Project
project2.description: A dashboard that a user can use to keep track of news articles, messages, events, and a diary.

project3.title: Arnold Flix
project3.subtitle: Firebase CRUD Project
project3.description:
A page that allows users to keep track of all of their favorite Arnold Schwarzenegger movies.

Features include adding, editing, deleting, rating, and adding to a Watchlist.

project4.title: Fling's Landing
project4.subtitle: Group Messaging App Project
project4.description: A Game of Thrones themed messaging app.
